DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study acceptability feasibility Mifepristone 400 mg sub-lingual Misoprostol 71-77 78-84 day gestation 50 case .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Outpatient Regimen Medical Abortion With Mifepristone Sublingual Misoprostol 11 12 Weeks
DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll 25 woman gestational age group . All participant submit routine screening per current practice La Rabta Hospital . The eligible woman receive dose 200 mg mifepristone 400 ug misoprostol take home sublingually . The first 5 woman enrol gestational age group ask return clinic 24-48 hour initial visit take misoprostol clinic wait 3 hour observational period return home . After initial phase , woman ask self-administer misoprostol home 24-48 hour administration mifepristone return clinic 7-10 day later . At follow-up , healthcare provider assure medical abortion complete ask woman respond series question exit interview .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age 7184 day amenorrhea Seeking abortion service Prepared able sign consent form Accept conform study procedure schedule visit Does meet study criterion
